build.buildCommand: composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && npm install && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: echo 'Starting Deployment...' && (touch database/database.sqlite || echo 'Touch Failed') && (chmod 777 database/database.sqlite || echo 'Chmod Failed') && echo 'Migrating...' && (php artisan migrate --force -v || echo 'Migrate Failed') && echo 'Starting Server...' && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
